ResourceHeader.Description: High-resolution magnetic field data from the Cassini magnetometer during the Saturn orbital phase in KRTP coordinates obtained from NASA/PDS plasma node

AccessURL.Name: CDPP/AMDA HAPI Server
AccessURL.Description: Web Service to this product using the HAPI interface.

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Thank you for acknowledging the use of AMDA in publications with wording like "Data analysis was performed with the AMDA science analysis system provided by the Centre de Données de la Physique des Plasmas (CDPP) supported by CNRS, CNES, Observatoire de Paris and Université Paul Sabatier, Toulouse". See the Rules of the road at https://amda.cdpp.eu/help/policy.html . Please acknowledge the Data Providers.

AccessURL.Name: CDPP/AMDA Web application
AccessURL.Description: Access to Data via CDPP/AMDA Web application.

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Thank you for acknowledging the use of AMDA in publications with wording like "Data analysis was performed with the AMDA science analysis system provided by the Centre de Données de la Physique des Plasmas (CDPP) supported by CNRS, CNES, Observatoire de Paris and Université Paul Sabatier, Toulouse". See the Rules of the road at https://amda.cdpp.eu/help/policy.html . Please acknowledge the Data Providers.

NumericalData.Caveats:
These data contain persistent noise signals at 0.2, 8, 16 Hz, and associated harmonics. This noise was not observed during ground testing of the instruments and is anticipated to be interference arising from the spacecraft. Removal of these signals is at the user's discretion.
There are errors in some of the Cassini MAG data in this data set due to incorrect handling of leapseconds. The errors are as follows: * 2012-07-01 00:00:00.000 - 2015-07-01 00:00:00.000 - Error : +1 s * 2015-07-01 00:00:00.000 - 2017-01-01 00:00:00.000 - Error : +2 s * 2017-01-01 00:00:00.000 - End of Mission - Error : +13 s
The time tags can be corrected by subtracting the error from current time values. This error was created during the conversion of the data from binary to ASCII performed at the PDS/PPI node. It does not exist in the original binary data files available from the Cassini MAG team. The PPI node will correct this error in it's data holdings at a future date.
Some versions of these data were determined to contain timing errors, including both backwards and repeated times. These timing errors have not been corrected in the data files. A full list of all files, and intervals containing timing errors is provided below: * 2003-09-11T00:02:02.439 2003-09-11T00:02:18.390 backwards * 2005-12-31T15:48:07.169 2005-12-31T23:59:59.888 backwards * 2006-05-30T00:19:41.029 2006-05-30T00:20:04.996 backwards * 2007-08-01T07:17:10.921 2007-08-01T07:17:18.855 backwards * 2007-12-19T00:00:01.631 2007-12-19T00:35:28.919 backwards * 2007-12-27T00:00:00.033 2007-12-27T00:00:20.000 backwards * 2008-03-12T00:00:11.701 2008-03-12T00:00:19.636 backwards * 2008-05-04T00:00:13.407 2008-05-04T00:00:29.276 backwards * 2008-05-27T00:00:05.382 2008-05-27T00:00:21.251 backwards * 2009-01-24T00:00:03.583 2009-01-24T00:00:07.550 backwards * 2009-02-21T00:00:15.395 2009-02-21T00:00:23.330 backwards * 2009-04-28T00:00:06.869 2009-04-28T00:00:22.804 backwards * 2009-07-24T00:00:14.454 2009-07-24T00:00:22.388 backwards * 2009-09-28T09:41:09.839 2009-09-28T09:41:29.806 backwards * 2009-12-19T00:05:02.755 2009-12-19T00:05:06.722 backwards * 2010-04-29T00:00:00.632 2010-04-29T00:00:12.099 backwards * 2011-11-19T00:00:02.492 2011-11-19T00:00:18.427 backwards * 2012-04-16T00:00:01.932 2012-04-16T00:00:09.866 backwards * 2012-09-26T13:55:34.270 2012-09-26T13:55:58.204 backwards * 2013-06-11T00:00:02.033 2013-06-11T00:00:17.902 backwards * 2015-01-15T00:00:02.704 2015-01-15T00:00:18.573 backwards * 2015-11-07T00:00:04.341 2015-11-07T00:00:20.276 backwards * 2016-06-07T00:00:15.522 2016-06-07T09:21:56.395 backwards * 2017-03-12T17:00:26.474 2017-03-12T18:21:12.765 backwards
